comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Probably Dr. Levitt Ellsworth Custer, Dentist, of Dayton Ohio. www.daytonhistorybooks.com/page/page/5601056.htm As it mentions in the obituary above, he was a noted cloud chaser and baloonist. Here is a NYT article from July 30, 1912 mentioning same: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F00EEDD1630E2...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Levitt_Ellsworth_Custer

comment.author: 43758249@N08
comment._content: He was probably related to George Armstrong Custer, whose family had strong roots in the Northern Ohio / Southern Michigan area.
